response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and the importance it holds for you, I propose a special introductory offer. For a limited time only, you can acquire this exceptional product at a price of $14,500. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects my confidence in its suitability for your needs. I look forward to hearing your response and the opportunity to serve you. Kind regards, Alice.", "product_price": 14500}
